objID.description: A unique identifier within this document for this object.

RoomStayRef.description: Refers to the obj ID on an object defined elsewhere in the current document.

FacilityRef.description: The hotel facility object for the room stay.  May include the hotel facility object or a reference to the hotel facility object.

language.description: Language of the response for the RoomStay (property). Note that the requested language may not be available for all properties and so the language of the response for each property may vary.

objID.description: A unique identifier within this document for this object.

Tier.description: TODO:  Create enumerated list.  Indicates the category of the room. Typical values would be Moderate, Standard, or Deluxe. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Segment Category Code (SEG).

SpecialRequest.description: This identifies a special request for this reservation and is typically hotel-specific.

numberOfUnits.description: Allows you to pass the number of units that the special request is for (e.g., if 4 rooms are booked you may want 3 with double\/double beds and 1 with a king).

taxInclusiveInd.description: Indicates that tax is included in the rate.

serviceFeeInclusiveInd.description: Indicates that service fees are included in the rate.

RatePlanCode.description: A string value may be used to request a particular code or an ID if the guest qualifies for a specific rate, such as AARP, AAA, a corporate rate, etc., or to specify a negotiated code as a result of a negotiated rate.

ratePlanQualifierInd.description: The Rate Plan Qualifier is used to control the sort order of RatePlans. Those Rate Plans that are not qualified will appear first, those that are qualified will appear last.

maxCommissionUnitApplies.description: Maximum number of units for which the commission will be applied. This may be used in conjunction with the frequency attribute.

CurrencyCode.description: Indicates the currency to be applied to the amounts located in the child elements.

ttaxInclusiveInd.description: When true, indicates that the commission is calculated using the rate including tax. When false, indicates that the commission is calculated using the net rate.

compositeInd.description: Indicates that the room (suite) is a composite of smaller units.

gender.description: Used to request or specify a gender assignment for a room. Note: Typically used by Hosteliers.

floor.description: Floor on which the room is located.

sharedRoomInd.description: If TRUE, the room requires or has sharing available. Note: Typically used by Hosteliers.

quantity.description: The quantity of this feature in the room.
The quantity of this feature in the room.

TODO.description: TODO Place holder for a hospitality activity object.

objID.description: A unique identifier within this document for this object.

HospitalityOffersRef.description: Refers to the obj ID on an object defined elsewhere in the current document.

objID.description: A unique identifier within this document for this object.

RoomRateRef.description: Refers to the objID on an object defined elsewhere in the current document.

effectiveDate.description: Specifies the starting date for this room rate.

expireDate.description: Specifies the end date for this room rate.

expireDateExclusiveInd.description: When true, the ExpireDate is the first day after the applicable period (e.g. when expire date is Oct 15  the last date of the period is Oct 14).
